```{R}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(moments)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
set.seed(15)
```

```{R}
df2_data <- data.frame(
    x = seq(0, 80, 0.1),
    y = dchisq(seq(0, 80, 0.1), df = 2)
)
df40_data <- data.frame(
    x = seq(0, 80, 0.1),
    y = dchisq(seq(0, 80, 0.1), df = 40)
)

ggplot(xlim = c(0, 80)) +
    geom_line(
        data = df2_data,
        aes(x = x, y = y, color = "2"),
    ) +
    geom_line(
        data = df40_data,
        aes(x = x, y = y, color = "40"),
    ) +
    labs(
        title = "Rozkłady Chi-kwadrat",
    ) +
    scale_color_manual(
        name = "Ilość st. swobody",
        values = c("2" = "blue", "40" = "red")
    ) +
    theme_classic()
```
